version.description: Gets or sets the base version string.

offSet.description: Gets or sets the offset to apply to the generated height.

label.description: Gets or sets the label parts to use in the generated version.

metadata.description: Gets or sets the Metadata parts to use in the generated version.

branches.description:
Gets or sets the information on branches.
See BranchConfiguration for further details.

release.description: Gets or sets the list of branches that may produce release versions.

overrides.description:
Gets or sets the configuration for branches which override the defaults.
See BranchOverrideConfiguration for further details.

match.description:
Gets or sets the regular expression string used to
identify matching to a branch to identify branch matches.

label.description: Gets or sets the label parts to override in the generated version.

prefixLabel.description: Gets or sets the label parts to insert at the start of the label in the generated version.

postfixLabel.description: Gets or sets the label parts to insert at the end of the label in the generated version.

insertLabel.description: Gets or sets the label parts to insert at specific indexes of the label in the generated version.

metadata.description: Gets or sets the metadata parts to use in the generated version.

prefixMetadata.description: Gets or sets the metadata parts to insert at the start of the metadata in the generated version.

postfixMetadata.description: Gets or sets the metadata parts to insert at the end of the metadata in the generated version.

insertMetadata.description: Gets or sets the metadata parts to insert at specific indexes of the metadata in the generated version.
